result.title: Synthesised Policy Recommendations
result.description: Synthesis of emerging recommendations relevant to ruralurban interaction and interdependencies in the form of a series of recommendations Particular attention will be paid to how ruralurban synergy governance can contribute to EUs smart sustainable and inclusive policymaking and vice versa and how they fit within the broader policy context for example the EU Territorial Agenda Cohesion Policy and EU budget planning post 2020
